profile.name: Uğur Danış
profile.title: Full Stack Developer
profile.description: A passionate software developer specializing in mobile, web, and backend development

about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hello, I'm Uğur. I've been developing software for over 4 years; sometimes someone who stares at the screen for hours, sometimes someone who saves (or completely breaks) the world with a single line of code.
about.experience: From mobile applications to web interfaces, from backend services written with Node.js to simple but smooth user experiences, my hands have touched code in many areas. I love creating user-centered, simple but functional work. My goal is 'it works and it's beautiful' rather than 'it works but it's not beautiful'.
about.passion: I love exploring new technologies, writing clean code, and saying 'that's it' to myself when I solve a problem.
about.summary: In short: I'm a developer who feels design, loves code, and cares about details.
about.quote: I like my coffee black, my code clean.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Some of the projects I've developed

tabuApp.title: TA BU - Mobile Taboo Game
tabuApp.description: A mobile taboo game developed with Flutter, designed for having fun with friends. Available on Google Play Store and Apple App Store. Features modern UI/UX design and smooth gaming experience.
tabuApp.features: Multiplayer mode, custom word lists, statistics, offline playability, published on app stores

googleKeepClone.title: Google Keep Clone
googleKeepClone.description: A modern note-taking mobile application developed with Flutter, featuring core Google Keep functionality. Cross-platform mobile app with intuitive interface and offline capabilities.
googleKeepClone.features: Note creation/editing, categories, search, offline sync, cross-platform

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: I develop performant, modern, and user-friendly applications for both Android and iOS using Flutter.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: I build fast, interactive, and elegant web interfaces with React. I love creating designs that pay attention to UI/UX harmony, simple but effective.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: I write powerful and scalable APIs with Node.js and Express, solving database management and server-side operations seamlessly.

product.title: Product-Oriented
product.description: Beyond code, I work with a perspective that puts the user and product at the center. Functionality, simplicity, and sustainability are indispensable for me.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You can contact me for your projects, ask your questions, or just say hello. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
